code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[order,setOrder]=useState({productId:'',quantity:1});const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();const response=await fetch('https://{API_GATEWAY_URL}/place-order',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(order)});const data=await response.json();console.log(data);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Place Order"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Product ID",value:order.productId,onChange:e=>setOrder({...order,productId:e.target.value})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",placeholder:"Quantity",value:order.quantity,onChange:e=>setOrder({...order,quantity:e.target.value})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Place Order"})]})]});}export default App;
